short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aiming to creating simple yet elegant new tab display!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Renovate your new tab with a wallpaper, date & time, and social links! The NewX extension sets your new tab search provider to Bing.
By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to install the NewX extension and setting Chrome™️ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Read Privacy Policy:
http://www.mytabsearch.com/privacy-policy/
